sense.def:
To imagine a situation
pomeni zamisliti si neki položaj.

seg.quote: It's hard to imagine a greater biological threat,
Try to imagine you're sitting on a cloud.
Can you imagine standing up there and giving a speech?

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
imagined something
, hočemo reči, da je nekdo mislil, da nekaj vidi ali sliši, čeprav se v resnici ni zgodilo ali obstajalo.

seg.quote: ‘I saw a thing on the mountain.’—‘You only imagined it.’

sense.def:
To imagine something is true
pomeni, da je po našem mnenju nekaj resnično.

seg.quote: I should imagine he wants you to hold his hand.
